{"id":388365845,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 3 months","timestamp":1598771039,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/388365845/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Vowels of a String","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string reverseVowels(string s) {\n        string v = \"aeiou\";\n        vector<int> pos;\n        int i = 0;\n        for(char c : s){\n            for(char d : v){\n                if(c == d){\n                    pos.push_back(i);\n                }\n            }\n            i++;\n        }\n        for(int i =0 ;i<pos.size()/2;i++){\n            swap(s[pos[i]],s[pos[pos.size()-1-i]]);\n        }\n        return s;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-vowels-of-a-string"}
